response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,500,000, reflecting its unparalleled quality, craftsmanship, and the innovative features it offers. Given its significance and the exclusivity it represents, I am extending to you a special invitation to consider purchasing this masterpiece.

To make this acquisition more accessible, I propose a price of $1,300,000. This offer encapsulates the essence of the product while allowing for a fair exchange, considering its worth to both parties. Should you find this proposal appealing, I would be honored to discuss further details and facilitate a transaction that benefits us all.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
